stimulusHtml: In Olympia, Manet challenges the standards of academic art through his use of
choicesHtml: an idealized female nude reclining on a couch, rendered with subtly modeled contours
details that identify the nude figure as a real person existing in a contemporary setting
an animal to serve as a symbol of the universal ideal of fidelity
extreme value contrasts to place focus on the ethnicity of the figures
